title: Higher latitude chain (Lat -84.4, Long 58.0), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field in Antarctica, 1-sec raw data. Station deployed Jan 2009, redeployed Dec 2012 under NSF award PLR-1243390 and ATM-922979 - C. R. Clauer (Virginia Tech.)

parameters.name: thg_mag_pg2
parameters.description: Magnetic field B in HEZ vector components

parameters.name: thg_magh_pg2
parameters.description: ---> H - Local magnetic North component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_pg2']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magd_pg2
parameters.description: ---> E - Local magnetic East component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_pg2']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magz_pg2
parameters.description: ---> Z - Local vertical down component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_pg2']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
